data.text: Month: October 2011 Drug Screen Company Information Corporate Health St. Thomas: Phone: 330-379-5959 Fax: 330-379-5268 Barberton: Phone: 330-615-5300 Fax: 330-615-5310 Wadsworth: Phone: 330-331-1510 Fax: 330-331-1923 Registration - If a person is not seeking treatment or only needs a reasonable suspicion drug screen / do not register the patient. If a company is not on the list: We CAN do the drug screen, but the injured worker or the employer representative must fill out the Drug Screen Information Sheet found in the Security Offices and in the ADT books on the drug screen carts. The employee / company representative may come with their own forms and/or collection kit. If the injured worker has their own supplies, then do the urine collection as usual but use our supplies. Deliver the specimens / forms to Summa Lab for delivery to Corporate Health. If they do not have their own forms, use the Summa Chain of Custody form and do the collection as usual and then refer the Employee to Corporate Health for results. At Akron City: Deliver all specimens and all forms to the Employee Health At St. Thomas: Deliver all specimens and all forms to Corporate Health At Cuyahoga Falls: Deliver all specimens and all forms to the Lab At Barberton: Deliver all specimens and all forms to refrigerator in Dirty Utility Room of ER At Wadsworth: Deliver all specimens to the refrigerator in Lab and all forms to mailbox in lab COMPANY NAME / ADDRESS Testing 4 B Wood 5125 Greenwich Rd Seville, OH 44273 A Better Home Healthcare North 83 N. Miller Road Akron, OH 44320 (The) American Group 127 N. Cleveland-Massillon Road Akron, OH 44333-2422 No Alcohol Screen Summa Chain of Custody Form Test requested by employer: [] 9-Panel Non-DOT Breathalyzer (yellow form) Summa Chain of Custody Form Test requested by employer: [] 9-Panel This company has DOT and Non-DOT employees. Ask the employee if they have a CDL. If they have a CDL, then: DOT Breathalyzer (white form) CRL Federal Chain of Custody Test to be performed: [] THC,COC,PCP,OPI,AMP If they do not have a CDL, then: Non-DOT Breathalyzer (yellow form) Summa Chain of Custody Form Test to be performed: [] THC,COC,PCP,OPI,AMP C:\Users\TimS\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\Temporary Internet Files\Content.Outlook\GSIGYIVS\ED Drug Screen List 2011.xls CONTACT PERSON PHONE # Tracy Romanotto 330-769-2188 Jack Isom 330-878-3399 Denise Angus 330-668-1845
